document.full_text: clashes have broken out in a flashpoint region of sudan controlled by the northern government, exacerbating tensions as the southern portion of the vast country prepares to secede following a referendum.
document.title: clashes reported in sudan flashpoint state
lines_and_colors: clashes have broken out in a flashpoint region of sudan controlled by the northern government, exacerbating tensions as the southern portion of the vast country prepares to secede following a referendum.
